actions.committee: House Committee on the District of Columbia
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the District of Columbia.

official_title: To allow Internation Risks, Incorporated, to use within the District of Columbia the name Special Risk Covers of the District of Columbia.

summary.text: Allows Internation Risks, Incorporated, to use within the District of Columbia, the name Special Risk Covers of the District of Columbia.

titles.title: To allow Internation Risks, Incorporated, to use within the District of Columbia the name Special Risk Covers of the District of Columbia.
